title: MHADA and for the areas of reservation to be handed over to MCGM/Appropriate Authority
clause_text: MHADA and for the areas of reservation to be handed over to MCGM/Appropriate Authority. This fungible compensatory area admissible to the rehabilitation tenements shall be utilized for rehabilitation component only. Its utilization for Sale Component under the CDS shall not be permissible.
section: (I) Development of reservation in Reconstruction or redevelopment of Cluster(s) of Buildings under Cluster Development Scheme(s)under Regulation No. 33(9):

source_pdf.text_snippet: MHADA and for the areas of reservation to be handed over to MCGM/Appropriate Authority. This fungible compensatory area admissible to the rehabilitation tenements shall be utilized for rehabilitation
